snippet: The Grammy Awards celebrated rock and folk almost to the exclusion of other genres; current scrutiny of the government's drone program points out the lack of attention paid to it thus far; and NBC Universal will rebrand one of its cable channels the...
abstract: The Grammy Awards celebrated rock and folk almost to the exclusion of other genres; current scrutiny of the government's drone program points out the lack of attention paid to it thus far; and NBC Universal will rebrand one of its cable channels the Esquire Network.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Folk and Rock are Ascendant at the Grammys, and a Belated Focus on Drones
